channel.title: Faced in game problems and now it crashes
channel.description:
#### What happened? After the update a few days ago whenever I join a game my name is not highlighted in green anymore and at night I'm in a random room alone even if I'm part of the cult, unseen or in jail, as well as when I'm cult or unseen the members are not highlighted either but instead shown in a box above the normal players one. I tried taking screenshots but the game just won't allow me anymore. Today when I tried play the game won't load and tells me 'the game crashed' with the specific folder that caused it and that I should contact a developer.
#### Comments:
I tried uninstalling the game and steam as well but the same problem remained.

item.title: Faced in game problems and now it crashes
item.dc:creator: khalid3010
item.description:
I just restarted my computer and opened the game without it crashing, also I was able to turn of streamer mode this time and now the game is back to normal. Thank a lot for you help!

Read full topic
item.source: Faced in game problems and now it crashes

item.title: Faced in game problems and now it crashes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
If it’s crashing when you start the game up, then it means it’s probably an issue with your OS. Usually updates to the OS will fix it.

Read full topic
item.source: Faced in game problems and now it crashes

item.title: Faced in game problems and now it crashes
item.dc:creator: khalid3010
item.description:
Yeah I just made sure all my drivers are up to date.

Read full topic
item.source: Faced in game problems and now it crashes

item.title: Faced in game problems and now it crashes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
Well make sure your drivers and OS are up to date, because that is cause of a lot of crashes.

Read full topic

item.title: Faced in game problems and now it crashes

item.description:
No I’m running the normal game because I also went into steam and loaded the game from there. Also Vulkan worked for me yesterday but had the same in game problems i mentioned earlier.

Read full topic
item.source: Faced in game problems and now it crashes

item.title: Faced in game problems and now it crashes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
It seems to be trying to start in Vulkan and failing. If you’re not choosing to use Vulkan on startup, then your graphics drivers or OS likely need updated.

Read full topic

item.source: Faced in game problems and now it crashes

item.title: Faced in game problems and now it crashes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
You’re in Streamer mode. You can turn it off in the options.

For the crashing, you should post the files from your crash folder in the bugs channel in the Discord.

Read full topic

item.title: Faced in game problems and now it crashes

item.description:

What happened?

After the update a few days ago whenever I join a game my name is not highlighted in green anymore and at night I’m in a random room alone even if I’m part of the cult, unseen or in jail, as well as when I’m cult or unseen the members are not highlighted either but instead shown in a box above the normal players one.
